metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16137 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The debug module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service whenuntrusted user input is passed into the o formatter. It takes around 50kcharacters to block for 2 seconds making this a low severity issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16137` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-debug - 3.1.0-1
node-debug - 3.1.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: node-debug package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-1').
